messages.message: Does AIHub also support documents of a different language? I’ve just run a CHinese ID card in and it was unable to find the ‘name’ of the person - even when there is a ‘Name’ label next to it
@Gwen Unfortunately we do not have a way to enable other languages at the moment but it's in the roadmap.
@Hari in many cases, we are able to translate the digitised documents in AI hub. Can the user extract information that way? e.g. extract k/v pairs in english

This can only happen if it’s a machine readable PDF or the script is still English alphabets. But this is not a reliable way, we need to extract the native language as it is. It will come down to providing language settings somewhere in the converse app
